descriptionHtml:
As you get stronger and stronger in your journeys through Skyrim, your name gets spread all over and great warrior want to challange you and see through their own eyes how strong you really are. (yes, crappy intro, I\'m out of inspiration)

How does it work?:

Upon reaching level 30, a courier will deliver you a mysterious note from a warrior that wants to challenge you to a fight to see who\'s the strongest of you two. After you defeat this warrior, you get to loot his body to the key to his chest and a pair of mystical gloves. The chest will contain they other 2 pairs.

Crafting:

After completing the quest, you\'ll be able to craft the items as well, at any forge, as long as you have the Arcane Smithing perk and Destruction level ??.
To craft them you need for:

Flaming Pugilist Gauntlets: 2 leather + 5 leather strips + 2 fire salts + grand soul gem (filled)
Freezing Pugilist Gauntlets: 2 leather + 5 leather strips + 2 frost salts + grand soul gem (filled)
Shocking Pugilist Gauntlets: 2 leather + 5 leather strips + 2 frost salts + grand soul gem (filled)

You\'ll be able to temper them as well with 1 leather + 1 corresponding salt.
